div.div: at Williamsport, Pa. | David Person Field

tr.td: Lyco wins toss, defers. LVC receives and will defend east endzone.
Jamie Fisher kickoff 63 yards to the LVC2, Tyeair Diggs return 30 yards to the LVC32 (Joe Pinzka).
Brendon Irving rush for 14 yards to the LVC46, 1ST DOWN LVC (Korahn Williams).
